Updated support methodologies and managed teams to align with regulatory requirements, including capturing appropriate approvals and documentation. SOX Compliance

Financial Controls

  • Designed and implemented SOX application controls (automated workflows, input validations, SOD configurations) and ITGCs (access management, change management, SDLC governance) for finance and accounting systems.
  • Established preventive controls (approval workflows, posting limits, 3-way matching) and detective controls (reconciliations, exception reports, audit trail reviews) to ensure data integrity and financial accuracy.
  • Managed financial reporting controls (close-process validations, variance analysis, MRC sign-offs) and process-level controls (revenue recognition, subledger reconciliations) across ERP modules and integrations.
  • Delivered corrective controls and remediation for control deficiencies, partnering with Internal Audit teams and external auditors to document RCMs and provide comprehensive audit evidence.

SDLC & Change Management

  • Established and enforced formal SDLC methodology (Agile/waterfall hybrid) with defined phases, gates, and documentation for all financial application changes impacting SOX-relevant systems.
  • Implemented end-to-end change governance including requirements gathering, design reviews, code inspections, multi-environment testing (dev/test/QA/prod), defect tracking, UAT, and management sign-offs.
  • Maintained strict environment segregation (dev/test/prod separation) and developer/approver SOD to ensure production releases underwent independent review and approval.
  • Provided SOX auditors with comprehensive SDLC evidence—change tickets, test scripts/results, UAT sign-offs, migration logs—for financial modules, integrations, and reporting configurations.
  • Led SOX-compliant release management for ERP customizations, ensuring all significant changes to financial reporting processes followed documented ITGC protocols with rollback capabilities.

Audit & Evidence

  • Conducted control walkthroughs with Internal Audit and external auditors (e.g., KPMG), demonstrating configurations, role mappings, and workflows for financial applications.
  • Provided comprehensive documentation including RCMs, process narratives, configuration justifications, SOD matrices, and screenshots of key controls.
  • Delivered audit evidence packages—change logs, access reviews, test results, UAT sign-offs, reconciliation reports—for SOX testing of application and ITGCs.
  • Justified system configurations and customizations impacting financial reporting, addressing auditor inquiries and remediating findings through targeted enhancements.
  • Supported deficiency remediation by implementing control improvements and re-testing, ensuring sustained SOX compliance across finance modules and integrations.

Business Processes & Workflows

  • Fixed Assets: Configured automated depreciation schedules, asset class hierarchies, CIP tracking, and disposal workflows, ensuring 100% compliance with capitalization policies and audit-ready FA schedules.
